blocks.name: supssd
blocks.content: Inequality deduction for supremum of a subset. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Mar-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm supssd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wbr(csup(c0, c1, c2), c2, csup(c3, c1, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wor(c2, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c3, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c1, wa(wral(s1, c3, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c3, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))))))))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c1, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wn(wbr(csup(c0, c1, c2), c2, csup(c3, c1, c2)))), wi(w0, wss(c0, c1)))
  mp2and(w0, wn(wbr(csup(c0, c1, c2), c2, csup(c3, c1, c2))), wcel(csup(c0, c1, c2), c1), wral(s2, c3, wn(wbr(csup(c0, c1, c2), c2, cv(s2)))))
  supcl(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  ralrimiv(s2, c3, w0, wn(wbr(csup(c0, c1, c2), c2, cv(s2))))
  syld(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c3), wn(wbr(csup(c0, c1, c2), c2, cv(s2))), wcel(cv(s2), c0))
  sseld(cv(s2), c3, c0, w0)
  supub(s0, s1, s2, cv(s2), c0, c1, c2, w0)
  supnub(s2, s0, s1, csup(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3, c2, w0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.csup.s(s2, c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm supssd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ¬ sup(c0, c1, c2)[c2]sup(c3, c1, c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ≺ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ⊆ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(∀(s1 ∈ c3, ¬ s0[c2]s1)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s1[c2]s0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c3, s1[c2]s2))))))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(∀(s1 ∈ c0, ¬ s0[c2]s1)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s1[c2]s0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c0, s1[c2]s2))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → ¬ sup(c0, c1, c2)[c2]sup(c3, c1, c2)), (w0 → c0 ⊆ c1))
  mp2and(w0, ¬ sup(c0, c1, c2)[c2]sup(c3, c1, c2), sup(c0, c1, c2)∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c3, ¬ sup(c0, c1, c2)[c2]s2))
  supcl(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  ralrimiv(s2, c3, w0, ¬ sup(c0, c1, c2)[c2]s2)
  syld(w0, s2 ∈ c3, ¬ sup(c0, c1, c2)[c2]s2, s2 ∈ c0)
  sseld(s2, c3, c0, w0)
  supub(s0, s1, s2, s2, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  supnub(s2, s0, s1, sup(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3, c2, w0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.csup.s(s2, c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: infssd
blocks.content: Inequality deduction for infimum of a subset. (Contributed by AV, 4-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm infssd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wbr(cinf(c0, c1, c2), c2, cinf(c3, c1, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wor(c2, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c1, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c1, wa(wral(s1, c3, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c3, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  mp2and(w0, wn(wbr(cinf(c0, c1, c2), c2, cinf(c3, c1, c2))), wcel(cinf(c3, c1, c2), c1), wral(s2, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s2), c2, cinf(c3, c1, c2)))))
  infcl(s0, s1, s2, c3, c1, c2, w0)
  ralrimiv(s2, c0, w0, wn(wbr(cv(s2), c2, cinf(c3, c1, c2))))
  syld(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c0), wn(wbr(cv(s2), c2, cinf(c3, c1, c2))), wcel(cv(s2), c3))
  sseld(cv(s2), c0, c3, w0)
  inflb(s0, s1, s2, cv(s2), c3, c2, c1, w0)
  infnlb(s2, s0, s1, cinf(c3, c1, c2), c1, c0, c2, w0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cinf.s(s2, c3, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm infssd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ¬ inf(c0, c1, c2)[c2]inf(c3, c1, c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ≺ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(∀(s1 ∈ c0, ¬ s1[c2]s0)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1 → ∃(s2 ∈ c0, s2[c2]s1))))))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(∀(s1 ∈ c3, ¬ s1[c2]s0)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1 → ∃(s2 ∈ c3, s2[c2]s1))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  mp2and(w0, ¬ inf(c0, c1, c2)[c2]inf(c3, c1, c2), inf(c3, c1, c2)∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ¬ s2[c2]inf(c3, c1, c2)))
  infcl(s0, s1, s2, c3, c1, c2, w0)
  ralrimiv(s2, c0, w0, ¬ s2[c2]inf(c3, c1, c2))
  syld(w0, s2 ∈ c0, ¬ s2[c2]inf(c3, c1, c2), s2 ∈ c3)
  sseld(s2, c0, c3, w0)
  inflb(s0, s1, s2, s2, c3, c2, c1, w0)
  infnlb(s2, s0, s1, inf(c3, c1, c2), c1, c0, c2, w0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cinf.s(s2, c3, c1, c2)
}
